summary: There are many great chefs around the world. Only one is considered to be a National hero. Meet chef Gaston Acurio and follow him in a journey to find out the stories, the inspirations and ... See full summary »
cast: Gaston Acurio|Andoni Aduriz|Alex Atala|Massimo Bottura|Elba Amparo Velarde Caceres|Diego Muñoz|Rene Redzepi|Joan Roca
title: Buscando a Gastón
